meta.title: OpenEconomy | Fair Exchange Protocol for Everyone
meta.description: Trade skills fairly without money. OpenEconomy is a decentralized time-value exchange where everyone's time has worth. Join free.

hero.headline: Fair Exchange. For Everyone.
hero.subheadline: A decentralized time-value exchange protocol where everyone's time has worth. Trade skills fairly, without money changing hands.

header.headline: The economy forgot millions
header.subheadline: Traditional systems exclude people without formal employment. But everyone has skills. Everyone's time has value.

items.name: Maria, 58
items.quote: I left my career 5 years ago. I have decades of experience, but the economy says I'm worth nothing now.
items.problem: No income, no way to trade skills for what she needs

items.name: David, 34
items.quote: Between gigs, I can't pay rent. But I could teach, perform, help with events. The system doesn't connect us.

items.name: James, 67
items.quote: I have 40 years of knowledge. I don't need more money, but I'd love to help people and stay active.
items.problem: Wants to contribute, not traditional employment

sections.summary: Stay-at-home parents. Artists between gigs. Retirees with wisdom to share. Immigrants rebuilding. Students learning. Their skills have real value. The traditional economy just doesn't recognize it.

insight.title: Time-Value Normalization
insight.description: Different skills have different market rates. But exchanges can still be FAIR.

example.result: Different time. Same value. Fair exchange.

items.title: Fair by Design
items.description: Exchanges are calculated based on each person's self-assessed value. No exploitation. No race to the bottom.

items.title: For Everyone
items.description: No bank account needed. No resume required. If you have skills and time, you can participate.

items.title: Trust Without Middlemen
items.description: Blockchain-verified exchanges. Community-built reputation. No platform taking a cut.

header.headline: Four steps to fair exchange
header.subheadline: Get started in minutes. Make your first exchange today.

items.title: Set Your Value
items.description: Self-assess your hourly rate based on your skills and experience. You decide what your time is worth.

items.title: List Your Skills
items.description: Add what you can offer: tutoring, repairs, design, cooking. Also list what you're looking for.

items.title: Find Matches
items.description: Browse the community or let our algorithm suggest perfect matches based on complementary skills and needs.

items.title: Exchange Fairly
items.description: Propose an exchange, agree on terms, complete the work, and confirm. Both parties rate the experience.

items.title: Fair Value

items.title: Non-Profit
